text:
[Verse]
Riding on a midnight train
Waves of sound won't feel no pain
City lights they fade away
Nighttime rhythm here to stay

[Verse 2]
Stars above they shine so bright
Guiding us through darkest night
Feel the heartbeat of the street
Moving to the urban beat

[Chorus]
Midnight train take me away
Chasing dreams till break of day
Feel the rhythm feel the groove
On this train we always move

[Verse 3]
People dance in shadow light
Laughter echoes through the night
Freedom calls with every mile
Faces glowing with a smile

[Bridge]
Whistle blows the engines roar
Onward always craving more
Journey endless never slow
Midnight train we're on the go

[Chorus]
Midnight train take me away
Chasing dreams till break of day
Feel the rhythm feel the groove
On this train we always move
title: Midnight Train
